channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Microsoft Windows XP Service Pack 3
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- Microsoft Windows XP Service Pack 3

item.title: CVE-2019-1489|2024-08-04T18:20:27.826Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20windows%20xp%20service%20pack%203
item.description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists when the Windows Remote Desktop Protocol (RDP) fails to properly handle objects in memory, aka 'Remote Desktop Protocol Information Disclosure Vulnerability'.
